cast.overview: In the early years of the 20th century, Mohandas K. Gandhi, a British-trained lawyer, forsakes all worldly possessions to take up the cause of Indian independence. Faced with armed resistance from the British government, Gandhi adopts a policy of 'passive resistance', endeavouring to win freedom for his people without resorting to bloodshed.
cast.title: Gandhi

cast.overview: The evil Queen Bavmorda hunts the newborn princess Elora Danan, a child prophesied to bring about her downfall. When the royal infant is found by Willow, a timid farmer and aspiring sorcerer, he's entrusted with delivering her from evil.
cast.title: Willow

cast.original_title: The Last Letter from Your Lover
cast.overview: A young journalist in London becomes obsessed with a series of letters she discovers that recounts an intense star-crossed love affair from the 1960s.
cast.title: The Last Letter from Your Lover

details.biography: David Sibley is an English actor. He is best known for character roles in several cult television series: as twisted radio DJ Tom Everett in BBC television detective series Shoestring; and in Doctor Who as Pralix. He appeared on a DVD extra when this story was released recently.
details.name: David Sibley
